prompts.oDataSourceTooltip: Select the OData service you want to replace
prompts.oDataSourceURITooltip: Enter the URI for the new OData source
prompts.maxAgeTooltip: (Optional) Enter the time in seconds it takes for a cached response of the service to expire.
prompts.oDataAnnotationSourceURITooltip: Server side annotations have been detected for the selected OData service. If needed, enter new annotation data source URI  for the changed service
prompts.oDataURIInfoLabel: Have in mind that common OData Service path prefixes are '{{- v2Prefix}}' or '{{- v4Prefix}}'
prompts.isInSafeModeLabel: Making manifest changes is not upgrade safe and the project will be set in advanced mode. Please continue if you are sure you want to have your project in advanced mode.
prompts.oDataURIV2InfoLabel: Have in mind that you are trying to replace OData {{versionOne}} Service with OData {{versionTwo}} Service

component.usageIdTooltip: Enter the component usage ID you want to add
component.nameTooltip: Enter the name of the component you want to add
component.isLazyTooltip: Select if the component should be lazy or not
component.tooltip: If needed enter any additional {{input}} in the  "key1":"value1","key2":"value2" format
component.shouldAddLibraryLabel: Do you want to add library reference?
component.shouldAddLibraryTooltip: Choose if you want to add library reference
component.libraryIsLazyTooltip: Choose if you want the library reference to be lazy or not

validators.errorDuplicatedValue: {{value}} with the same name was already added to the project
validators.errorInvalidValueForSpecialChars: {{value}} must contain only Latin alphanumeric characters or the following symbols: '-','_','$' and '.'
